00011 int rand_between_ints( int a , int b )
00012 {
00013   return rand()%( a - b + 1 ) + b;
00014 } 
00015 
00016 double rand_between_doubles( double a , double b )
00017 {
00018   return rand()%( a - b + 1 ) + b;
00019 }   
00020 
00021 double rand_equal_double( double a , double b )
00022 {
00023   return ( (double) rand() / DBL_MAX ) * ( b - a ) + a;
00024 }

00026 int rand_equal_int( int a , int b )
00027 {
00028   return rand()%( b - a + 1 ) + a;
00029 }

00032 /* basic neural network activation function: sigmoid */
00033 double n_neural_sigmoid ( double x ) 
00034 {
00035  return 1.0 /( 1 + exp( -x ) ); 
00036 }

00038 /*! allocate a new layer */
00039 N_NEURAL_LAYER *new_neural_net_layer( int size_x , int size_y )
00040 {s
00041                 N_NEURAL_LAYER *layer = NULL ;
00042                 
00043                 if( size_x < 0 || size_y < 0 )
00044                                 return NULL ;
00045                                 
00046                 Malloc( layer , N_NEURAL_LAYER , 1 );
00047                 __n_assert( layer , return NULL );
00048                 
00049                 layer -> array = calloc( sizeof( N_PERCEPTRON *) , size_x );
00050                 for( int itx = 0; itx < size_x ; itx++ )
00051                 {
00052                                 Malloc( layer -> array[ itx ] ,  N_PERCEPTRON * , size_y );
00053                                 for( int ity = 0 ; ity < size_y ; ity ++ );
00054                 }
00055 
00056 }
00057 
00058 typedef struct N_NEURAL_LAYER
00059 {
00060                 /*! Width of the layer */
00061                 int size_x ,
00062                 /*!             Height of the layer */
00063                 size_y ;
00064                 /*! Dynamically allocated array of perceptron. Some can be NULL. */
00065                 N_PERCEPTRON ***array ;
00066                 
00067 } N_NEURAL_LAYER ;

00077                 if( !neural_net )
00078                                 return NULL ;
00079                 
00080                 neural_net -> network = new_generic_list( 0 );
00081

00083                 
00084                 
00085                 
00086                 return neural net ;

00118 int neural_net_compute( NEURAL_NETWORK *neural_net , double *output )
00119 {
00120                 __n_assert( neural_net , return FALSE );
00121                 __n_assert( neural_net ->  network , return FALSE );
00122                 __n_assert( neural_net ->  network -> start , return FALSE );
00123                 __n_assert( neural_net ->  network -> start  -> ptr , return FALSE );
00124                 __n_assert( neural_net ->  network -> intput , return FALSE );
00125                 
00126                 /* processing input data to input layer */
00127                 N_NEURAL_LAYER *layer = NULL ;
00128                 layer = __n_assert( neural_net ->  network -> start  -> ptr );
00129                 for( int x = 0 ; x < layer -> x_size ; x ++ )
00130                 {
00131                                 for( int y = 0 ; y < layer -> y_size ; y ++ )
00132                                 {
00133                                                 if( layer -> array[ x ][ y ] != NULL )
00134                                                 {
00135                                                                 layer -> array[ x ][ y ] -> output = neural_net -> input[ x ][ y ] ;
00136                                                 }
00137                                 }
00138                 }
00139                 
00140                 return TRUE ;
00141 }

00145 void PropagateLayer(NET* Net, LAYER* Lower, LAYER* Upper)
00146 {
00147   INT  i,j;
00148   REAL Sum;
00149 
00150   for (i=1; i<=Upper->Units; i++) {
00151     Sum = 0;
00152     for (j=0; j<=Lower->Units; j++) {
00153       Sum += Upper->Weight[i][j] * Lower->Output[j];
00154     }
00155     Upper->Output[i] = 1 / (1 + exp(-Net->Gain * Sum));
00156   }
00157 }
